thread.title_full: Blue Jays playoff times revealed | MLB PLAYOFFS | Blue Jays | Sports | Toronto S

author: TORONTO SUN
title: Blue Jays playoff times revealed | MLB PLAYOFFS | Blue Jays | Sports | Toronto S
text:
The Blue Jays will play two afternoon games at the Rogers Centre to open the playoffs.
Game 1 of the American League Division Series against the visiting Texas Rangers will start at 3:37 or 4:07 p.m. on Thursday. The earlier start will occur if the Houston Astros win Tuesday's wild-card game and the later time happens if the New York Yankees win it.
Game 2 is Friday at 12:45 p.m., at the Rogers Centre. Game 3 is Sunday at 8:10 p.m., in Texas.
The remaining two games will be next Monday in Texas and next Wednesday in Toronto if necessary. No times have been announced.
